meta.title: Turistik Rota | Vacation Planning | Tour Booking
meta.description: Turistik Rota is a website that specializes in vacation planning, travel advice, unexplored routes and travel guidance. We offer unexplored routes in different categories such as culture, nature, city and adventure tourism for your domestic and international travels. Follow our site for accommodation options, tour bookings and guidance on travel matters!
meta.keywords: Vacation planning, travel suggestions, travel guide, tourist routes, undiscovered places, Domestic vacation, International vacation, Cultural tourism, Nature tourism, City tourism, Adventure tourism, Family vacation, Romantic vacation, Sea vacation

founding.title: Founding
founding.text: Turistik Rota was founded in February 2023 by a young person who likes to travel and lives in a touristic area. The idea was to create a website that would help people plan their vacations, benefit from other people's experiences, and book tours.

development.title: Development
development.text: Turistik Rota is currently under development. We are working hard to make it available as soon as possible. We will be launching the website soon.

launch.title: Launch
launch.text: Turistik Rota will be launched soon. We will be offering vacation planning, travel advice, unexplored routes and travel guidance. We will also be offering tour bookings and accommodation options. Follow our site for more information!

ourVision.title: Our Vision
ourVision.p1: Turistik Rota is a website specializing in vacation planning, travel suggestions, undiscovered routes and travel guidance. We offer unexplored routes in different categories such as culture, nature, city and adventure tourism for your domestic and international travels. Accommodation options, Follow our site for tour bookings and guidance on travel matters!
ourVision.p2: While our site offers various opportunities to people who love to travel, it also allows users to share their experiences. Our activities such as accommodation options, local tours, nature walks, gastronomic tours make the holiday experience of our visitors more enjoyable, while also enabling them to interact more closely with the local people.

quality.title: Quality
quality.text: Quality in tourism is directly related to guest satisfaction. Our vision is to provide our visitors with the highest quality service and an unforgettable holiday experience. Therefore, we strive to constantly improve our business, train our staff and follow the latest trends in the industry.

experience.title: Experience
experience.text: Tourism experience is an experience that visitors get as a result of their interaction with the activities, culture, history and natural beauties in the places they travel. This experience helps visitors to collect unforgettable memories and get to know different cultures. Our aim is to give our visitors the highest level of experience. and to turn their vacation into an unforgettable memory.

social.title: Social
social.text: In Turistikrota, visitors can interact with each other, share their travel experiences and exchange information on travel-related topics. Also, our visitors can create a community for people who love to travel.

head.title: It will be put into
head.subtitle: Service Soon!
head.text: Turistikrota is a platform that aims to provide you with the best and real tourism experience, see other people's tourism experiences, communicate with them, get to know popular touristic areas and be safe while doing all these.

network.title: Network
network.text: Meet on a shared social platform with hotels, hosts, guides, tourists, tour companies and more.

safe.title: Secure
safe.text: Turistikrota offers advanced security measures to ensure the safety of travelers and hosts.

worldwide.title: Worldwide
worldwide.text: Turistikrota allows people from all over the world to interact with each other. Meet and travel with people all over the world.

meta.title: About Us | Turistik Rota
meta.description: Touristic Route is a platform that allows you to experience the best tourism experience worldwide and share this experience with other people.
meta.keywords: tourist route, tourist route, about us, about tourist route, about tourist route
